articles.title: Ukraine invasion: U.S tells citizens to leave Russia immediately - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: The United States of America, USA has told its citizens to consider leaving Russia immediately on commercial flights, the State Department announced. The US issued a security alert on the website of US Embassy in Moscow, citing the increasing number of airlin…
articles.content:
